mapper.select:
select id, user_id, zj_id, name, code, zt, chanquan, DATA_CODE, SYS_FLAG, DATA_ORDER, STATUS, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_USER_NAME, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6 from zjk_zhuanli where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and user_id like '%${userId}%'
and zj_id like '%${zjId}%'
and name like '%${name}%'
and code like '%${code}%'
and zt like '%${zt}%'
and chanquan like '%${chanquan}%'
and DATA_CODE like '%${dataCode}%'
and SYS_FLAG like '%${sysFlag}%'
and DATA_ORDER like '%${dataOrder}%'
and STATUS like '%${status}%'
and DEL_FLAG like '%${delFlag}%'
and CREATE_DATE like '%${createDate}%'
and CREATE_USER like '%${createUser}%'
and CREATE_USER_NAME like '%${createUserName}%'
and UPDATE_DATE like '%${updateDate}%'
and UPDATE_USER like '%${updateUser}%'
and UPDATE_USER_NAME like '%${updateUserName}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
